item.title: reSlim Modules
item.description:
An extension for reSlim Framework.

Simple, easy, scalable and plugable into every project of reSlim Framework.

item.title: reSlim UI Boilerplate
item.description: Basic UI template for production use with reslim.

item.title: reSlim
item.description:
reSlim is Lightweight, Fast, Secure, Simple, Scalable, Flexible and Powerful rest api framework.
reSlim is based on Slim Framework version 3.

item.title: iSlim 3
item.description: I call this “iSlim” because I heart Slim Framework. iSlim version 3 is the easiest and flexible way to create your PHP application using PSR 7 way, which is look alike MVC pattern and Bootstrap 4.

item.title: iSlim
item.description: I call this “iSlim” because I heart Slim Framework. iSlim is the easiest and flexible way to create your PHP application using a MVC pattern and Bootstrap 4.

item.title: WorkForm Desktop Framework
item.description: Template for design and build desktop application in NET. Very minimalist and faster using momo library engine.

item.title: Javelinee CMS
item.description: The project is a Content Management SEO Automatic System which is it called Javelinee CMS. It is build with minimalist framework to make this project really simple and fast in development and to work with other plugins.
